Mellilla.text: Been obliged to leave before the arrival of your letter. Telegraph to ---

Mellinia.text: Been obliged to leave before the arrival of your letter. Write again to ---

Mellis.text: Do not forward any more letters. Keep them until my return

Mellitorum.text: Forward all letters until further instructions to ---

Mellitum.text: Forward my letters to-day to Poste Restante ---

Mello.text: Forward my letters to-day and to-morrow to Poste Restante ---

Mellorum.text: Forward my letters until further instructions to Poste Restante ---

Mellum.text: Forward my letters to-day to Poste Restante here

Melofolia.text: Forward my letters to-day and to-morrow to Poste Restante here

Melofoliam.text: Forward my letters until further instructions to Poste Restante here

Meminisse.text: Have not received any letter from you since ---

Memoris.text: Have not received any letter from you. Telegraph at once to ---

Memoratus.text: Have not received any letter from you. Write at once to ---

Mendacis.text: Have you received my letter with enclosures
